subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Labor and Jobs
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The league announced Friday that games from Oct. 9 to 15 were off and that further decisions would be made as warranted. Camps were to open Oct. 3.
snippet: The league announced Friday that games from Oct. 9 to 15 were off and that further decisions would be made as warranted. Camps were to open Oct. 3.
